Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

(C) Yu Gao et al. miaSim: an R/Bioconductor package to easily simulate microbial community dynamics. Methods in Ecology and Evolution (2023). Version 1.9.1 Package URL: microbiome.github.io/miaSim
